set-firefox-as-default-pdf-handler-on-wi.userFacingName: Set Firefox as default PDF handler on Windows for new users -- rollout
set-firefox-as-default-pdf-handler-on-wi.userFacingDescription: This rollout changes "Make Firefox default" to include setting Firefox as the default PDF handler on Windows.
